```{r setup, fig.width=7}
library(bonanza)
library(tidyverse)

seedfall <- bonanza::bnz_seedfall %>%
          filter(TrayNo == 1) %>%
          filter(Site == "FP5A")

seedfall$`#Seeds` <- as.numeric(seedfall$`#Seeds`)

ggplot(data = seedfall, aes(x = `Seed Year`, y = `#Seeds`, group=`Species`, color=`Species`)) + geom_line()
```
